item.description:
For this Meet-up we will return to the 2nd Story Theater in Warren, RI for "Little Women." Here is the description of the play from 2nd Story's brochure:

"Christmas won't be Christmas without any presents.  So begins Louisa May Alcott's coming of age story about family, love, loss, and hope.  It also begins Bob Colonna's original stage adaptation of this beloved American tale.  It's become a tradition at 2nd Story to offer life-affirming classics during the holidays that the entire family can enjoy.  So join us, because the holidays won't be the holidays without you."

Note that this play is NOT part of the 2nd Story Subscription package.

Ticket Information

Tickets are $30.  ($25 for subscribers.) Seating is General Admission.
Each person is responsible for purchasing their own ticket. For reservations, please call the 2nd Story Theater at 401-247-4200.

Please Note that Friday nights at 2nd Story do sell out early. Please do not wait to order your tickets! I strongly recommend that you order your tickets now.

When you order your ticket, please tell them you are a member of this group.  They will then reserve our seats together.

Dinner Information

Location is TBD but will be in the Barrington or Warren area.  If you have a suggestion, please let me know.

For those that will be attending dinner, reservations will be made under "RI Theater Group" for 6:00 PM.

Cost of dinner will be handled as follows:

Drinks will be consigned to a separate check from the meal. Each person will add 30% to the price of their drink to cover the 8% RI Tax plus a 20% tip.

The meal will be on one check. A 20% tip will be added to the total and meal check will be divided evenly by the number of people attending the dinner.

I will send an e-mail including my cell phone number to all who RSVP "yes". If you will not make it to the restaurant by 6:00 PM please let me know.

Dinner is optional and is not included in the price of the ticket.

Meet-up Logistics

There is a fairly large parking lot located next to the theater between Market Street and Route 114 in Warren. A sign for Second Story Theater is on Route 114, although it's somewhat hidden.

If you are attending dinner, reservations will be under "RI Theater Group."  Meet at our table by 6:00 PM.  If you are not attending dinner, identify yourself as a member of this group when you arrive at the theater and they will show you to our seats.
item.name: Little Women
